info.description: This is a sample server for E-Meeting.
info.title: E-Meeting API

get.description: Get analytics data for paid transactions within date range

post.description: Request a password reset token to be sent to the user's email

put.description: Reset user password using a valid reset token

get.description: Retrieve meeting reservation history filtered by user_id, room_id, or date.
Get full reservation detail (master + reservation details) by reservation ID
Get all reservation schedules between date range with pagination

post.description: Create a new room with image validation (JPG/PNG ≤1MB)

get.description: Get all reservations for a specific room

post.description: Upload an image to temp folder and return its URL

get.description: Retrieve user details by user ID

put.description: Update user details by user ID

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
